Posts.Content: I really thought that mammograms was the nay or yay for the idea of any possible breast cancers. I am a black woman 42yrs with a strong family of breast cancer. Last month a lump in my armpit was found and both mammogram and ultrasound was found adnormal. I more concerned to understand what is and what isn't then for the doctors to not really say much. I mean the lady comes in and say well theres a lot going on in your breast and your lumph nodes and in large so we need to do more testing..What is that suppose to mean?..On 10/25/2012 I will have an MRI..I just what to know something.
Posts.Title: Mammograms
